scripts.build: npm run build:bitmama && npm run build:morphing  && npm run build:ig && npm run build:ig_story && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:bitmama: cd projects/bitmama  && npm instal && npm run build
scripts.build:morphing: cd projects/morphing && npm instal && npm run build
scripts.build:ig: cd projects/ig && npm instal &&  npm run build
scripts.build:ig_story: cd projects/ig_story && npm instal &&  npm run build
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist/projects/bitmama dist/projects/morphing dist/projects/ig dist/projects/ig_story && cp -r projects/bitmama/dist/* dist/projects/bitmama/ && cp -r projects/morphing/dist/* dist/projects/morphing/ && cp -r projects/ig/dist/* dist/projects/ig/ && cp -r projects/ig_story/dist/* dist/projects/ig_story/ && cp index.html dist/
